title: Total Landscape Of The Heart 11.09.20
itunes:title: Total Landscape Of The Heart 11.09.20
description:
In episode 755, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Jamie Loftus discuss how the right is doing with Biden's win, the Murdoch family deciding out democratic faith, Mother Pence's disdain in 2016, the passing of Alex Trebek, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. THAT Avengers election meme
  2. Televangelist Kenneth Copeland laughs at the media for declaring that Joe Biden has won the election and will become president.
  3. It began on a gold escalator. It may have ended at Four Seasons Total Landscaping.
  4. here's what dnc speaker & potential biden cabinet member john kasich had to say about progressives today
  5. Jared Kushner, Melania Trump advise Trump to accept election loss
  6. AS TRUMP IS DEFEATED, THE MURDOCHS TRY TO DODGE BACKLASH FOR FOX NEWS
  7. 'Leave me alone': Mike Pence's wife reportedly refused to kiss him after Trump won
  8. Alex Trebek, Longtime Host of ‘Jeopardy!,’ Dies at 80
  9. WATCH: Nina Simone - Baltimore (Official Audio)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
